events.message: I was involved in a collision yesterday while driving my car and need to file an insurance claim immediately.
The claim has been categorized as an auto accident involving vehicle damage after reviewing the initial report.
An agent from the auto claims department has been assigned to handle your case and will contact you shortly.
Your claim for the car accident has been received and acknowledged. We will proceed with further steps soon.
Please submit photos of the vehicle damage, police report, and your driver’s license to process the claim accurately.
All requested documentation including accident photos, police report, and proof of ownership have been successfully submitted.
Our investigation team has begun reviewing the submitted evidence and contacting witnesses for the car collision case.
Investigation has concluded confirming the liability and extent of damages to the vehicle in the collision incident.
A settlement offer has been prepared based on the investigation findings and damage estimates for your damaged vehicle.
The customer has reviewed the proposed settlement and provided positive feedback, agreeing with the offer terms.
Following acceptance of the settlement, the claim approval has been finalized and the payout process initiated.
Payment for the approved claim amount has been issued to the customer’s designated bank account successfully.
With payment completed and all processes fulfilled, the auto accident claim case is now officially closed.
The claim records and documentation related to this car accident have been archived for future reference as required.
